attributes.action: Halt Foreign aid and redirect the money to boost the NHS
attributes.additional_details: The Prime Ministers apology on Television evidences the fact that the NHS is over stretched, under resourced and under funded. NHS have openly admitted that the hospitals are in dire straights, the worst they have ever seen in their career. Lets stop this now and put our own house in order before assisting other countries..
attributes.background: The NHS is currently over stretched & under funded. Not enough money is spent looking after the people in the UK but we still send 0.7% GDP out in foreign aid. Redirect the foreign aid to the NHS until we can sort out our own problems first.
